title: Martin McDonagh | A Closer Look: Donald Trump Jr. and WikiLeaks; Trump Meets Duterte
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how President Trump spent his trip to Asia cozying up to authoritarian strongmen and new information about the Trump campaign’s relationship with WikiLeaks.

Then, filmmaker and playwright Martin McDonagh discusses his film "In Bruges" with Seth and reveals how Frances McDormand almost had a buzz cut for the film "Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri."

McDonagh also takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night producer Sarah Jenks-Daly exclusively for this podcast.
